card.name: Angelic Blessing
card.property: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains flying until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only the warrior who can admit mortal weakness will be bolstered by immortal strength.

card.name: Angelic Protector
card.property: Flying Whenever Angelic Protector becomes the target of a spell or ability, Angelic Protector gets +0/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My family sheltered in her light, the dark was content to wait."—Crovax

card.name: Anoint
card.property: Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.) Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn.

card.name: Armor Sliver
card.property: All Sliver creatures have "{2}: This creature gets +0/+1 until end of turn."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Hanna: "We must learn how they protect each other."Mirri: "After they're done trying to kill us, all right?"

card.name: Armored Pegasus
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I always charge a little extra to take on a pegasus. They fly like eagles, kick like mules, and hide like hermits."—Tahli en-Dal, bounty hunter

card.name: Avenging Angel
card.property: Flying When Avenging Angel dies, you may put it on top of its owner's library.

card.name: Bandage
card.property: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Takara shook with guilt. She knew the last image her father had seen was her sword flashing toward him.

card.name: Cataclysm
card.property: Each player chooses from among the permanents he or she controls an artifact, a creature, an enchantment, and a land, then sacrifices the rest.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Weatherlight dragged the Predator behind it, the cradle hauling the casket.

card.name: Charging Paladin
card.property: Whenever Charging Paladin attacks, it gets +0/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Hope shall be the blade that severs our bonds."

card.name: Conviction
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+3. {W}: Return Conviction to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It was not the minotaur's shoulders but his soul that bore the heaviest weight.

card.name: Disenchant
card.property: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The swarm seemed unmoved by the artificial slivers' destruction. "They clearly were not the leaders," Hanna cursed. "I guess we'll have to do this the hard way."

card.name: Exalted Dragon
card.property: Flying Exalted Dragon can't attack unless you sacrifice a land. (This cost is paid as attackers are declared.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If dragons excel at anything more than vanity, it is greed.

card.name: Field of Souls
card.property: Whenever a nontoken creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

card.name: Gallantry
card.property: Target blocking creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Forgive me," Mirri whispered. "I thought you a burden, and you saved my life." Hanna quietly accepted the apology.

card.name: Gerrard's Battle Cry
card.property: {2} {W}: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gerrard grinned and drew his sword. "This won't be a fair fight," he called to his crew. "They should have brought a second ship!"

card.name: Humility
card.property: All creatures lose all abilities and have base power and toughness 1/1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "One cannot cleanse the wounds of failure."—Karn, silver golem

card.name: Kor Chant
card.property: All damage that would be dealt this turn to target creature you control by a source of your choice is dealt to another target creature instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The true treasure no thief can touch.

card.name: Master Decoy
card.property: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A skilled decoy can throw your enemies off your trail. A master decoy can survive to do it again."—Gerrard of the Weatherlight

card.name: Mounted Archers
card.property: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) {W}: Mounted Archers can block an additional creature this turn.

card.name: Nomads en-Kor
card.property: {0}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to Nomads en-Kor this turn is dealt to target creature you control instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The kor forsake roots for the winding of the path, forsake voices for the silence of the mind, forsake all else for the poverty of isolation.

card.name: Orim, Samite Healer
card.property: {T}: Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The silkworm spins itself a new existence. So the healer weaves the threads of life."—Orim, Samite healer

card.name: Pacifism
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Frozen by conscience, Karn did not resist as the moggs carried him to the Predator.

card.name: Paladin en-Vec
card.property: First strike, protection from black and from red (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike. It can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything black or red.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our belief shall be the lance that pierces Volrath's heart."

card.name: Pegasus Stampede
card.property: Buyback—Sacrifice a land. (You may sacrifice a land in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.) Create a 1/1 white Pegasus creature token with flying.

card.name: Repentance
card.property: Target creature deals damage to itself equal to its power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The cannon wasn't aimed at you!" pleaded Vhati."I'm not sure which is more pathetic," replied Greven, "your judgment or your aim."

card.name: Shackles
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step. {W}: Return Shackles to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Shackles of gold are still shackles.

card.name: Shaman en-Kor
card.property: {0}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to Shaman en-Kor this turn is dealt to target creature you control instead. {1}{W}: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to target creature this turn, that damage is dealt to Shaman en-Kor instead.

card.name: Smite
card.property: Destroy target blocked creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You've got your childhood wish at last. Now you get to die."—Gerrard, to Volrath

card.name: Soltari Champion
card.property: Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.) Whenever Soltari Champion attacks, other creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Soltari Lancer
card.property: Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.) Soltari Lancer has first strike as long as it's attacking.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In times of war the victors rarely save their best for last."—Gerrard of the Weatherlight

card.name: Soltari Monk
card.property: Protection from black Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)

card.name: Soltari Priest
card.property: Protection from red Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In Rath," the priest said, "there is even greater need for prayer."

card.name: Soltari Trooper
card.property: Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.) Whenever Soltari Trooper attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Dauthi blood is soltari wine."—Soltari Tales of Life

card.name: Spirit en-Kor
card.property: Flying {0}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to Spirit en-Kor this turn is dealt to target creature you control instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Death free throat from thirst, mouth from speech, feet from earth.—Kor requiem

card.name: Spirit Mirror
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, if there are no Reflection tokens on the battlefield, create a 2/2 white Reflection creature token. {0}: Destroy target Reflection.

card.name: Standing Troops
card.property: Vigilance

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The less you have, the harder you fight for it.

card.name: Staunch Defenders
card.property: When Staunch Defenders enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Hold your position! Leave doubt for the dying!"—Tahngarth of the Weatherlight

card.name: Wall of Essence
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Whenever Wall of Essence is dealt combat damage, you gain that much life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The ceiling and the floor fell in love, but only the wall knew.—Dal saying

card.name: Warrior en-Kor
card.property: {0}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to Warrior en-Kor this turn is dealt to target creature you control instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only a matter as vital as destroying Volrath could bring together the reclusive kor people.

card.name: Winds of Rath
card.property: Destroy all creatures that aren't enchanted. They can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There shall be a vast shout and then a vaster silence."—Oracle en-Vec

card.name: Youthful Knight
card.property: First strike

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let no child be without a sword. We will all fight, for if we fail, we will certainly all die."—Oracle en-Vec

card.name: Capsize
card.property: Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.) Return target permanent to its owner's hand.

card.name: Counterspell
card.property: Counter target spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It was probably a lousy spell in the first place."—Ertai, wizard adept

card.name: Curiosity
card.property: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature deals damage to an opponent, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All Mirri wanted to do was rest, but she couldn't ignore a nagging suspicion as she followed Crovax's skulking form.

card.name: Dismiss
card.property: Counter target spell. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There is nothing you can do that I cannot simply deny."—Ertai, wizard adept

card.name: Dream Halls
card.property: Rather than pay the mana cost for a spell, its controller may discard a card that shares a color with that spell.

card.name: Dream Prowler
card.property: Dream Prowler can't be blocked as long as it's attacking alone.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To think that some find sleep a restful state."—Volrath

card.name: Ephemeron
card.property: Flying Discard a card: Return Ephemeron to its owner's hand.

card.name: Fighting Drake
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Two things are needed to survive the harsh skies of Rath: a thick hide and a thicker skull.

card.name: Forbid
card.property: Buyback—Discard two cards. (You may discard two cards in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.) Counter target spell.

card.name: Gaseous Form
card.property: Enchant creature Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by enchanted creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's hard to hurt anyone when you're as transparent as your motives."—Ertai, wizard adept

card.name: Hammerhead Shark
card.property: Hammerhead Shark can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Cross the eyes of a hammerhead and you'll dot its teeth.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "So like men are they: a hardened shell with fragile flesh beneath."—Selenia, dark angel

card.name: Intuition
card.property: Search your library for three cards and reveal them. Target opponent chooses one. Put that card into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Killer Whale
card.property: {U}: Killer Whale gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Hunger is like the sea: deep, endless, and unforgiving.

card.name: Legacy's Allure
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a treasure counter on Legacy's Allure. Sacrifice Legacy's Allure: Gain control of target creature with power less than or equal to the number of treasure counters on Legacy's Allure. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)

card.name: Legerdemain
card.property: Exchange control of target artifact or creature and another target permanent that shares one of those types with it. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Squee tucked the warm ball in his pocket and slipped a pebble in its place. "Glok," he mumbled, and hid.

card.name: Mana Leak
card.property: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The fatal flaw in every plan is the assumption that you know more than your enemy."—Volrath

card.name: Mawcor
card.property: Flying {T}: Mawcor deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: From its maw comes neither word nor whisper—only wind.

card.name: Meditate
card.property: Draw four cards. You skip your next turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Part of me believes that Barrin taught me meditation simply to shut me up."—Ertai, wizard adept

card.name: Merfolk Looter
card.property: {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the depths of Rootwater, salvage and sewage differ only in texture.

card.name: Mnemonic Sliver
card.property: All Slivers have "{2}, Sacrifice this permanent: Draw a card."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A jigsaw puzzle that lives, breeds, and thinks."—Hanna, Weatherlight navigator

card.name: Rootwater Hunter
card.property: {T}: Rootwater Hunter deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Bitter water, vicious wave;Shadow-cold shallows, root-made maze.Home's angry embrace."—Rootwater Saga

card.name: Scrivener
card.property: When Scrivener enters the battlefield, you may return target instant card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "History is a potent weapon."—Karn, silver golem

card.name: Sea Monster
card.property: Sea Monster can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Water is life. Or perhaps it is just something to wash it down with.

card.name: Shadow Rift
card.property: Target creature gains shadow until end of turn. (It can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.) Draw a card.

card.name: Sift
card.property: Draw three cards, then discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Twice I have let the Legacy slip away. Never again."—Karn, silver golem

card.name: Silver Wyvern
card.property: Flying {U}: Change the target of target spell or ability that targets only Silver Wyvern. The new target must be a creature.

card.name: Spell Blast
card.property: Counter target spell with converted mana cost X. (For example, if that spell's mana cost is {3}{U}{U}, X is 5.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Call it the thinking mage's version of brute force.

card.name: Thalakos Drifters
card.property: Discard a card: Thalakos Drifters gains shadow until end of turn. (It can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They drift in and out of shadow and ever on toward madness.

card.name: Thalakos Scout
card.property: Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.) Discard a card: Return Thalakos Scout to its owner's hand.

card.name: Thalakos Seer
card.property: Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.) When Thalakos Seer leaves the battlefield, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You see our world when you shut your eyes so tightly that tiny shapes float before them."—Lyna, to Ertai

card.name: Time Ebb
card.property: Put target creature on top of its owner's library.

card.name: Time Warp
card.property: Target player takes an extra turn after this one.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let's do it again!"—Squee, goblin cabin hand

card.name: Tradewind Rider
card.property: Flying {T}, Tap two untapped creatures you control: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It is said that the wind will blow the world past if you wait long enough.

card.name: Twitch
card.property: You may tap or untap target artifact, creature, or land. Draw a card.

card.name: Volrath's Curse
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated. That creature's controller may sacrifice a permanent for that player to ignore this effect until end of turn. {1}{U}: Return Volrath's Curse to its owner's hand.

card.name: Wayward Soul
card.property: Flying {U}: Put Wayward Soul on top of its owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No home, no heart, no hope."—Stronghold graffito

card.name: Whispers of the Muse
card.property: Buyback {5} (You may pay an additional {5} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.) Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I followed her song only to find it was a dirge."—Crovax

card.name: Wind Dancer
card.property: Flying {T}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Flying like a bird does not make you as free as one."—Volrath

card.name: Wind Drake
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Orim regarded Gerrard coolly. "You are like the drake," she said, her expression unchanging. "It works hard to maintain its position, but to us it seems to glide along effortlessly. You must do the same."

card.name: Winged Sliver
card.property: All Sliver creatures have flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Everything around here has cut a deal with gravity."—Gerrard of the Weatherlight

card.name: Cannibalize
card.property: Choose two target creatures controlled by the same player. Exile one of those creatures and put two +1/+1 counters on the other.

card.name: Carnophage
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, tap Carnophage unless you pay 1 life.

card.name: Clot Sliver
card.property: All Slivers have "{2}: Regenerate this permanent."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "One would think I would be accustomed to unexpected returns."—Hanna, Weatherlight navigator

card.name: Coercion
card.property: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a card from it. That player discards that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There's very little that escapes me, Greven. And you will escape very little if you fail."—Volrath

card.name: Coffin Queen
card.property: You may choose not to untap Coffin Queen during your untap step. {2}{B}, {T}: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. When Coffin Queen becomes untapped or you lose control of Coffin Queen, exile that creature.

card.name: Commander Greven il-Vec
card.property: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.) When Commander Greven il-Vec enters the battlefield, sacrifice a creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Rage is the only freedom left to me."

card.name: Corpse Dance
card.property: Buyback {2} (You may pay an additional {2} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.) Return the top creature card of your graveyard to the battlefield. That creature gains haste until end of turn. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Crovax the Cursed
card.property: Crovax the Cursed enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may sacrifice a creature. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on Crovax. If you don't, remove a +1/+1 counter from Crovax. {B}: Crovax gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Cursed Flesh
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -1/-1 and has fear. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A farewell to arms . . . and feet . . . and legs . . .

card.name: Dark Banishing
card.property: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It is the way of most wizards to begin by exiling themselves and to end by exiling everyone else."—Hanna, Weatherlight navigator

card.name: Dark Ritual
card.property: Add {B}{B}{B} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If there is such a thing as too much power, I have not discovered it."—Volrath

card.name: Dauthi Horror
card.property: Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.) Dauthi Horror can't be blocked by white creatures.

card.name: Dauthi Jackal
card.property: Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.) {B}{B}, Sacrifice Dauthi Jackal: Destroy target blocking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All dauthi are jackals, regardless of breed."—Lyna, soltari emissary

card.name: Dauthi Marauder
card.property: Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The dauthi came from beneath the ruins one night, and the darkness cast them in the best possible light."—Soltari Tales of Life

card.name: Dauthi Slayer
card.property: Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.) Dauthi Slayer attacks each turn if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They have knives for every soul."—Lyna, soltari emissary

card.name: Dauthi Warlord
card.property: Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.) Dauthi Warlord's power is equal to the number of creatures with shadow on the battlefield.

card.name: Death Pits of Rath
card.property: Whenever a creature is dealt damage, destroy it. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the sludge below began to shift and take shapes, Gerrard turned from the railing to Orim. "I suppose," he said, "it's a little too late for prayer, isn't it?"

card.name: Death Stroke
card.property: Destroy target tapped creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For a sharp second, Selenia froze, and Crovax's blade found home. As the angel shattered like glass, Crovax felt his mind collapse—the curse had been fulfilled.

card.name: Death's Duet
card.property: Return two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Life has always been a dance. It is only fitting that death sing the tune.

card.name: Diabolic Edict
card.property: Target player sacrifices a creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Greven il-Vec lifted Vhati off his feet. "The fall will give you time to think on your failure."

card.name: Dungeon Shade
card.property: Flying {B}: Dungeon Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A sickness stirs in its eyes, a nightmare born in darkened wails.

card.name: Evincar's Justice
card.property: Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.) Evincar's Justice deals 2 damage to each creature and each player.

card.name: Fugue
card.property: Target player discards three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My ship . . . ," Sisay mumbled. "Intact," Gerrard reassured her, "which is more than I can say for you, my friend." Sisay laughed despite the pain.

card.name: Gravedigger
card.property: When Gravedigger enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A full coffin is like a full coffer—both are attractive to thieves.

card.name: Kezzerdrix
card.property: First strike At the beginning of your upkeep, if your opponents control no creatures, Kezzerdrix deals 4 damage to you.

card.name: Lab Rats
card.property: Buyback {4} (You may pay an additional {4} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.) Create a 1/1 black Rat creature token.

card.name: Living Death
card.property: Each player exiles all creature cards from his or her graveyard, then sacrifices all creatures he or she controls, then puts all cards he or she exiled this way onto the battlefield.

card.name: Necrologia
card.property: Cast Necrologia only during your end step. As an additional cost to cast Necrologia, pay X life. Draw X cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My enemies' death yields threefold benefit: removal, reuse, and research."—Volrath

card.name: Rats of Rath
card.property: {B}: Destroy target artifact, creature, or land you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "These creatures offer new challenges in the scrutiny of entrails."—Oracle en-Vec

card.name: Reanimate
card.property: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. You lose life equal to its converted mana cost.

card.name: Recurring Nightmare
card.property: Sacrifice a creature, Return Recurring Nightmare to its owner's hand: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I am confined by sleep and defined by nightmare."—Crovax

card.name: Revenant
card.property: Flying Revenant's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard.

card.name: Sarcomancy
card.property: When Sarcomancy enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token. At the beginning of your upkeep, if there are no Zombies on the battlefield, Sarcomancy deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Screeching Harpy
card.property: Flying {1}{B}: Regenerate Screeching Harpy.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They are called ‘fowl' for a reason."—Mirri of the Weatherlight

card.name: Serpent Warrior
card.property: When Serpent Warrior enters the battlefield, you lose 3 life.

card.name: Skyshroud Vampire
card.property: Flying Discard a creature card: Skyshroud Vampire gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If it tastes one drop of elvish blood I will cast it from the shroud to see it burn."—Eladamri, Lord of Leaves

card.name: Spinal Graft
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+3. When enchanted creature becomes the target of a spell or ability, destroy that creature. It can't be regenerated.

card.name: Stronghold Assassin
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Destroy target nonblack creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The assassin sees only throats and hears only heartbeats.

card.name: Thrull Surgeon
card.property: {1} {B}, Sacrifice Thrull Surgeon: Look at target player's hand and choose a card from it. That player discards that card. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Just take a little off the top."

card.name: Vampire Hounds
card.property: Discard a creature card: Vampire Hounds gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The hounds' barks are a horrifying chorus of screams, moans, and whispers.

card.name: Wall of Souls
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Whenever Wall of Souls is dealt combat damage, it deals that much damage to target opponent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It is the nature of evil to turn you against yourself."—Starke

card.name: Aftershock
card.property: Destroy target artifact, creature, or land. Aftershock deals 3 damage to you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Every act of destruction has a repercussion."—Karn, silver golem

card.name: Anarchist
card.property: When Anarchist enters the battlefield, you may return target sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'll take that. You won't need it when the revolution comes."

card.name: Barbed Sliver
card.property: All Sliver creatures have "{2}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Spans of spines leapt from one sliver to the next, forming a deadly hedge around the Weatherlight.

card.name: Canyon Wildcat
card.property: Mountainwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Relative of yours?" Ertai teased. Mirri simply sneered.

card.name: Craven Giant
card.property: Craven Giant can't block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: What is high as a mountain and low as a snake?—Dal riddle

card.name: Deadshot
card.property: Tap target creature. It deals damage equal to its power to another target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Carrion! Keep your distance. My blade will come to you!"—Crovax

card.name: Fanning the Flames
card.property: Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.) Fanning the Flames deals X damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Flame Wave
card.property: Flame Wave deals 4 damage to target player and each creature he or she controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I hear the roaring of a wave whose waters are red and whose mists are black."—Oracle en-Vec

card.name: Flowstone Blade
card.property: Enchant creature {R}: Enchanted creature gets +1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Remember the fable of the elf who came upon a cave of gold. In trying to free the largest piece, she was crushed by its weight."—Karn, silver golem

card.name: Flowstone Mauler
card.property: Trample {R}: Flowstone Mauler gets +1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Once these horrifying creatures were perfected, there was no need for armodons.

card.name: Flowstone Wyvern
card.property: Flying {R}: Flowstone Wyvern gets +2/-2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Where I come from, stone stays on the ground."—Tahngarth of the Weatherlight

card.name: Furnace Brood
card.property: {R}: Target creature can't be regenerated this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Furnace air crackles with magmatic cackles.

card.name: Goblin Bombardment
card.property: Sacrifice a creature: Goblin Bombardment deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One mogg to aim the catapult, one mogg to steer the rock.

card.name: Kindle
card.property: Kindle deals X damage to target creature or player, where X is 2 plus the number of cards named Kindle in all graveyards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Hope of deliverance is scorched by the fire of futility.

card.name: Lightning Blast
card.property: Lightning Blast deals 4 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Those who fear the darkness have never seen what the light can do."—Selenia, dark angel

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Faugh!" snorted Tahngarth. "Why would it make a meal of something like you?" Squee looked relieved. "No," he continued, "you'd make a much better toothpick."

card.name: Mage il-Vec
card.property: {T}, Discard a card at random: Mage il-Vec deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Living below a flowstone foundry produces a disproportionate number of fire mages among the il.

card.name: Magmasaur
card.property: Magmasaur enters the battlefield with five +1/+1 counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may remove a +1/+1 counter from Magmasaur. If you don't, sacrifice Magmasaur and it deals damage equal to the number of +1/+1 counters on it to each creature without flying and each player.

card.name: Maniacal Rage
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and can't block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only by sacrificing any semblance of defense could Gerrard best Greven.

card.name: Mogg Conscripts
card.property: Mogg Conscripts can't attack unless you've cast a creature spell this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Torahn's horns! They've seen us. Now, statue, you must fight to save yourself!"—Tahngarth, aboard the Predator

card.name: Mogg Fanatic
card.property: Sacrifice Mogg Fanatic: Mogg Fanatic deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I got it! I got it! I—"

card.name: Mogg Flunkies
card.property: Mogg Flunkies can't attack or block alone.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They'll attack whatever's in front of them—as long as you tell them where that is.

card.name: Mogg Infestation
card.property: Destroy all creatures target player controls. For each creature that died this way, that player creates two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.

card.name: Mogg Maniac
card.property: Whenever Mogg Maniac is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to target opponent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Stand clear if he gets an itch.

card.name: Ogre Shaman
card.property: {2}, Discard a card at random: Ogre Shaman deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ogre shamans must be bright enough to learn their invocations and dim enough to use them.

card.name: Pandemonium
card.property: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, that creature's controller may have it deal damage equal to its power to target creature or player of his or her choice.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If we cannot live proudly, we die so!"—Eladamri, Lord of Leaves

card.name: Rathi Dragon
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) When Rathi Dragon enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you sacrifice two Mountains.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Wrap the flame as twine,Kingdoms will be thine.

card.name: Renegade Warlord
card.property: First strike Whenever Renegade Warlord attacks, each other attacking creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "His tongue must be honey, the way he gathers ants to fight with him."—Volrath

card.name: Rolling Thunder
card.property: Rolling Thunder deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or players.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Such rage," thought Vhati, gazing up at the thunderhead from the Predator. "It is Greven's mind manifest."

card.name: Sabertooth Wyvern
card.property: Flying, first strike

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Most creatures grow out of their baby teeth, but sabertooth wyverns grow into theirs.

card.name: Sandstone Warrior
card.property: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.) {R}: Sandstone Warrior gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I used to describe something stable as ‘rock solid.' So much for that expression."—Gerrard of the Weatherlight

card.name: Searing Touch
card.property: Buyback {4} (You may pay an additional {4} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.) Searing Touch deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Seething Anger
card.property: Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.) Target creature gets +3/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Shadowstorm
card.property: Shadowstorm deals 2 damage to each creature with shadow.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You've not seen a storm until you've seen the kind that roars between worlds."—Lyna, soltari emissary

card.name: Shard Phoenix
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Sacrifice Shard Phoenix: Shard Phoenix deals 2 damage to each creature without flying. {R}{R}{R}: Return Shard Phoenix from your graveyard to your hand. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

card.name: Shatter
card.property: Destroy target artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Such fuss over machines, Gerrard. Remember that you are the prize of the Legacy. Throw away your toys!"—Orim, Samite healer

card.name: Spellshock
card.property: Whenever a player casts a spell, Spellshock deals 2 damage to that player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A snap of fingers, a snap of teeth.

card.name: Spitting Hydra
card.property: Spitting Hydra enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it. {1}{R}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spitting Hydra: Spitting Hydra deals 1 damage to target creature.

card.name: Starke of Rath
card.property: {T}: Destroy target artifact or creature. That permanent's controller gains control of Starke of Rath. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I know to whom I owe the most loyalty, and I see him in the mirror every day."—Starke

card.name: Stun
card.property: Target creature can't block this turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I concede it was a cheap shot, but it was the only one I could afford."—Gerrard of the Weatherlight

card.name: Wall of Diffusion
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Wall of Diffusion can block creatures with shadow as though Wall of Diffusion had shadow.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The injury was being caught between this world and our own; the insult was to find walls within."—Lyna, soltari emissary

card.name: Aluren
card.property: Any player may cast creature spells with converted mana cost 3 or less without paying their mana cost and as though they had flash.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Squee bounced up and down. "I sees a horsey, an' a piggy, an' a—""If you don't shut up," hissed Mirri, "you'll see a kidney and a spleeny."

card.name: Canopy Spider
card.property: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We know our place in the cycle of life—and it is not as flies."—Eladamri, Lord of Leaves

card.name: Carnassid
card.property: Trample {1}{G}: Regenerate Carnassid.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The hunter would never forget the time or place where he first met the carnassid, for they buried him there.

card.name: Crashing Boars
card.property: Whenever Crashing Boars attacks, defending player chooses an untapped creature he or she controls. That creature blocks Crashing Boars this turn if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Bores ruin a party. Boars are party to ruin.

card.name: Elven Rite
card.property: Distribute two +1/+1 counters among one or two target creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the bough stretches, so shall you grow. As the roots spread, so shall you thrive.

card.name: Elvish Fury
card.property: Buyback {4} (You may pay an additional {4} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.) Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Endangered Armodon
card.property: When you control a creature with toughness 2 or less, sacrifice Endangered Armodon.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: These are its last days. It is doomed to be remembered only until the hunters hunger again.

card.name: Harrow
card.property: As an additional cost to cast Harrow, sacrifice a land. Search your library for up to two basic land cards and put them onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Changing Rath's landscape is like tearing the scab from a wound.

card.name: Heartwood Dryad
card.property: Heartwood Dryad can block creatures with shadow as though Heartwood Dryad had shadow.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To snare what lies between worlds takes the patient reach of trees.

card.name: Heartwood Giant
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice a Forest: Heartwood Giant deals 2 damage to target player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Wind in the trees is soothing, but the same can't be said for trees on the wind.

card.name: Hermit Druid
card.property: {G}, {T}: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a basic land card. Put that card into your hand and all other cards revealed this way into your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Seeking the company of plants ensures that your wits will go to seed.

card.name: Horned Sliver
card.property: All Sliver creatures have trample.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A bristling wave of slivers broke against the Weatherlight's timbers.

card.name: Krakilin
card.property: Krakilin enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. {1}{G}: Regenerate Krakilin.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A perfect reflection of its world: brutal, fetal, and lacking truth."—Oracle en-Vec

card.name: Lowland Basilisk
card.property: Whenever Lowland Basilisk deals damage to a creature, destroy that creature at end of combat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Unlike their cousins, Rathi basilisks turn their victims into puddles of flowstone.

card.name: Manabond
card.property: At the beginning of your end step, you may reveal your hand and put all land cards from it onto the battlefield. If you do, discard your hand.

card.name: Mirri, Cat Warrior
card.property: First strike, forestwalk, vigilance (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike, it can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest, and attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Full of beauty and grace, with a predator's instincts . . . Although she wanders, I have always thought Mirri belongs in Llanowar most of all."—Rofellos, Llanowar emissary

card.name: Mulch
card.property: Reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all land cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Hope is the one crop that can grow in any climate.

card.name: Muscle Sliver
card.property: All Sliver creatures get +1/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The air was filled with the cracks and snaps of flesh hardening as the new sliver joined the battle.

card.name: Needle Storm
card.property: Needle Storm deals 4 damage to each creature with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The rain is driven like nails.

card.name: Oath of Druids
card.property: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player chooses target player who controls more creatures than he or she does and is his or her opponent. The first player may reveal cards from the top of his or her library until he or she reveals a creature card. If he or she does, that player puts that card onto the battlefield and all other cards revealed this way into his or her graveyard.

card.name: Overrun
card.property: Creatures you control get +3/+3 and gain trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You want to know your enemy? Look at your feet while you trample him."—Tahngarth of the Weatherlight

card.name: Provoke
card.property: Untap target creature you don't control. That creature blocks this turn if able. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mirri did not have time to think, only to react.

card.name: Rampant Growth
card.property: Search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rath forces plants from its surface as one presses whey from cheese.

card.name: Reality Anchor
card.property: Target creature loses shadow until end of turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "See how you like it."—Ertai, wizard adept

card.name: Recycle
card.property: Skip your draw step. Whenever you play a card, draw a card. Your maximum hand size is two.

card.name: Rootbreaker Wurm
card.property: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to defending player or planeswalker while attacking.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As Gerrard made his escape, the wurm covered his flight by helping itself to three great mouthfuls of merfolk.

card.name: Rootwalla
card.property: {1} {G}: Rootwalla gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If you try to sneak up on a rootwalla, you'll suddenly find yourself dealing with twice the lizard.

card.name: Skyshroud Elf
card.property: {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool. {1}: Add {R} or {W} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It is our duty to endure."—Eladamri, Lord of Leaves

card.name: Skyshroud Troll
card.property: {1} {G}: Regenerate Skyshroud Troll.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The elves and merfolk have nothing but bitterness for each other. The trolls, however, find them both rather tasty.

card.name: Spike Breeder
card.property: Spike Breeder enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it. {2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Breeder: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. {2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Breeder: Create a 1/1 green Spike creature token.

card.name: Spike Colony
card.property: Spike Colony enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it. {2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Colony: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

card.name: Spike Feeder
card.property: Spike Feeder enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. {2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Feeder: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Feeder: You gain 2 life.

card.name: Spike Hatcher
card.property: Spike Hatcher enters the battlefield with six +1/+1 counters on it. {2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Hatcher: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. {1}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Hatcher: Regenerate Spike Hatcher.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "As it moved, the wurm's spines gathered up bits of flowstone, which took the shapes of dead villagers' heads. Each head spoke a single sound, but if taken together, they said, ‘Alas for the living.'"—Dal myth of the wurm

card.name: Survival of the Fittest
card.property: {G}, Discard a creature card: Search your library for a creature card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: These are its last days. Better to grow broad and heavy. Better that the enemy is crushed beneath its carcass.

card.name: Tranquility
card.property: Destroy all enchantments.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Peace will come, but whether born of harmony or entropy I cannot say."—Oracle en-Vec

card.name: Verdant Force
card.property: At the beginning of each upkeep, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Burl, scurf, and bowerBirth fern and flower.

card.name: Verdant Touch
card.property: Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.) Target land becomes a 2/2 creature that's still a land. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)

card.name: Verdigris
card.property: Destroy target artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Only the most sophisticated inventions can survive nature's unsophisticated motivations."—Hanna, Weatherlight navigator

card.name: Wall of Blossoms
card.property: Defender When Wall of Blossoms enters the battlefield, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Each flower identical, every leaf and petal disturbingly exact.

card.name: Acidic Sliver
card.property: All Slivers have "{2}, Sacrifice this permanent: This permanent deals 2 damage to target creature or player."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The first sliver burst against the cave wall, and others piled in behind to deepen the new tunnel.

card.name: Crystalline Sliver
card.property: All Slivers have shroud. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Bred as living shields, these slivers have proven unruly—they know they cannot be caught.

card.name: Dracoplasm
card.property: Flying As Dracoplasm enters the battlefield, sacrifice any number of creatures. Dracoplasm's power becomes the total power of those creatures and its toughness becomes their total toughness. {R}: Dracoplasm gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Hibernation Sliver
card.property: All Slivers have "Pay 2 life: Return this permanent to its owner's hand."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mogglings have been known to play ball with hibernating slivers, completely unaware of their true nature.

card.name: Selenia, Dark Angel
card.property: Flying Pay 2 life: Return Selenia, Dark Angel to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I am light. I am dark. I must give my life to serve; not even death can release me."

card.name: Sliver Queen

property.name: Color
property.value: Multicolor White Blue Black Red Green

card.property: {2}: Create a 1/1 colorless Sliver creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her children are ever part of her.

card.name: Soltari Guerrillas
card.property: Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.) {0}: The next time Soltari Guerrillas would deal combat damage to an opponent this turn, it deals that damage to target creature instead.

card.name: Spined Sliver
card.property: Whenever a Sliver becomes blocked, that Sliver gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature blocking it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Slivers are evil and slivers are sly;And if you get eaten, then no one will cry."—Mogg children's rhyme

card.name: Vhati il-Dal
card.property: {T}: Until end of turn, target creature has base power 1 or base toughness 1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Sir, I just thought . . . ," explained Vhati."Don't think," interrupted Greven. "It doesn't suit you."

card.name: Victual Sliver
card.property: All Slivers have "{2}, Sacrifice this permanent: You gain 4 life."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We are kinfolk," explained Karn to the sliver queen. "Just as you need your progeny to complete you, so do I need the pieces of the Legacy to make me whole."

card.name: Wood Sage
card.property: {T}: Choose a creature card name. Reveal the top four cards of your library and put all of them with that name into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.

card.name: Bottle Gnomes
card.property: Sacrifice Bottle Gnomes: You gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I am reminded of the fable of the silver egg. Its owner cracks it open to see what jewels it holds, only to discover a simple yellow yolk."—Karn, silver golem

card.name: Coat of Arms
card.property: Each creature gets +1/+1 for each other creature on the battlefield that shares at least one creature type with it. (For example, if two Goblin Warriors and a Goblin Shaman are on the battlefield, each gets +2/+2.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Hup, two, three, four,Dunno how to count no more."—Mogg march

card.name: Coiled Tinviper
card.property: First strike

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The bite of the tinviper feels most like a razor drawn across the tongue.

card.name: Cursed Scroll
card.property: {3}, {T}: Choose a card name, then reveal a card at random from your hand. If that card has the chosen name, Cursed Scroll deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Emmessi Tome
card.property: {5}, {T}: Draw two cards, then discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It is like life and destiny: we think we know the story, but we have read only half the tale.

card.name: Erratic Portal
card.property: {1}, {T}: Return target creature to its owner's hand unless its controller pays {1}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In Barrin's name!" cried Lyna as Hanna's sword passed through her, "Ertai sends word that the portal is open—but not for long!"

card.name: Grindstone
card.property: {3}, {T}: Target player puts the top two cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard. If both cards share a color, repeat this process.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Memory is a burden that wears at the soul as weather wears at stone."—Crovax

card.name: Jinxed Idol
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, Jinxed Idol deals 2 damage to you. Sacrifice a creature: Target opponent gains control of Jinxed Idol.

card.name: Lotus Petal
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice Lotus Petal: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Hard to imagine," mused Hanna, stroking the petal, "such a lovely flower inspiring such greed."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the clever counterfeit was accepted by the hive, Volrath's influence upon the slivers grew even stronger.

card.name: Mindless Automaton
card.property: Mindless Automaton enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. {1}, Discard a card: Put a +1/+1 counter on Mindless Automaton. Remove two +1/+1 counters from Mindless Automaton: Draw a card.

card.name: Mox Diamond
card.property: If Mox Diamond would enter the battlefield, you may discard a land card instead. If you do, put Mox Diamond onto the battlefield. If you don't, put it into its owner's graveyard. {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

card.name: Patchwork Gnomes
card.property: Discard a card: Regenerate Patchwork Gnomes.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Just when I get them working, they always start fighting and tearing at each other for spare parts."—Hanna, Weatherlight navigator

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They are convenient in having no souls, but less so in having no spirit."—Volrath

card.name: Skyshaper
card.property: Sacrifice Skyshaper: Creatures you control gain flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It'll get us to the portal, but I can't guarantee what it'll do to the ship."—Hanna, Weatherlight navigator

card.name: Telethopter
card.property: Tap an untapped creature you control: Telethopter gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After losing several of the devices to midair collisions, Greven forbade moggs from operating telethopters.

card.name: Thopter Squadron
card.property: Flying Thopter Squadron enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it. {1}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Thopter Squadron: Create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery. {1}, Sacrifice another Thopter: Put a +1/+1 counter on Thopter Squadron. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Volrath's Laboratory
card.property: As Volrath's Laboratory enters the battlefield, choose a color and a creature type. {5}, {T}: Create a 2/2 creature token of the chosen color and type.

card.name: Caldera Lake
card.property: Caldera Lake enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {U} or {R} to your mana pool. Caldera Lake deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Cinder Marsh
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool. Cinder Marsh doesn't untap during your next untap step.

card.name: City of Traitors
card.property: When you play another land, sacrifice City of Traitors. {T}: Add {C}{C} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "While we fought, the il surrendered."—Oracle en-Vec

card.name: Maze of Shadows
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Untap target attacking creature with shadow. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by that creature this turn.

card.name: Mogg Hollows
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool. Mogg Hollows doesn't untap during your next untap step.

card.name: Pine Barrens
card.property: Pine Barrens enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {B} or {G} to your mana pool. Pine Barrens deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Rootwater Depths
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool. Rootwater Depths doesn't untap during your next untap step.

card.name: Salt Flats
card.property: Salt Flats enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {W} or {B} to your mana pool. Salt Flats deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Scabland
card.property: Scabland enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {R} or {W} to your mana pool. Scabland deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Skyshroud Forest

card.name: Stalking Stones
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {6}: Stalking Stones becomes a 3/3 Elemental artifact creature that's still a land. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)

card.name: Thalakos Lowlands
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {W} or {U} to your mana pool. Thalakos Lowlands doesn't untap during your next untap step.

card.name: Vec Townships
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {G} or {W} to your mana pool. Vec Townships doesn't untap during your next untap step.

card.name: Volrath's Stronghold
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {1}{B}, {T}: Put target creature card from your graveyard on top of your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The seed of a world's evil.

card.name: Wasteland
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}, Sacrifice Wasteland: Destroy target nonbasic land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The land promises nothing and keeps its promise."—Oracle en-Vec
